description:
Domon travels to Neo Canada to fight Andrew Graham and his Lumber Gundam, but Andrew refuses, and he is defeated unofficially, as no official match takes place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ada wa Utsu! Fukushuu no Uchuu Keiji
An Old Grudge: Revenge of the Space Police
Ein alter Groll! Die Rache der Weltraumpolizei
L’heure de la vengeance ! La rancœur du policier spatial
仇は討つ! 復讐の宇宙刑事
